backend/main.mo: Defines a Submission type, stores submissions in a List, and provides functions to submit and retrieve contact form entries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a resume-download requirement to the HomeSection component and related metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all major frontend files including sections, hooks, components, and assets.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining light and dark theme color variables and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, fonts, and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring providers and rendering all portfolio sections with navigation and footer.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the footer with dynamic year, branding, and a caffeine.ai referral link.
frontend/src/components/Reveal.tsx: Animation wrapper that reveals children on scroll using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Layout component providing a styled section wrapper with container spacing.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders the About section with bio text, career goal, strengths, and tools using reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/sections/Achieve: Displays key achievements in a grid with icons and animated reveal effects.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Contact form component with validation and mutation submission plus static contact info links.
frontend/src/components/sections/Educati: Renders a list of education entries with icons and reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/sections/Experie: Displays an internship role with a list of achievements using animated reveal.
frontend/src/components/sections/HomeSec: Hero section with name, summary, and buttons for navigation and resume download.
frontend/src/components/sections/Project: Shows multiple analytics projects with descriptions, tools, and outcomes.
frontend/src/components/sections/SkillsS: Displays skills with icons and animated proficiency bars.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Sticky responsive navbar with smooth scrolling, active section tracking, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login handling, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a mutation for submitting the contact form via the backend actor and invalidates submissions cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealOnScroll.ts: Custom hook using IntersectionObserver to detect when an element becomes visible and expose a ref and visibility flag.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom OKLCH theme variables for light/dark modes and utility extensions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that sets up React root, React Query provider, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors from CSS variables, typography/plugins, and extended animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing portfolio requirements, design notes, issues, and implemented features.
